casebody.data:
No. 10-9706. Vincent Maurice Harris, Petitioner v. Board of Supervisors of Louisiana State University & Agricultural & Mechanical College. 563 U.S. 1024, 131 S. Ct. 2935,

180 L. Ed. 2d 229,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4082, May 31, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 409 Fed. Appx. 725.
